name: Atlas Legends
description:
You, the player progress through a top down linear setting, defeating waves of enemies in order to upgrade and learn new abilities. By obtaining crafting materials you can make new weapons which allows tackling tougher challenges and more powerful enemies by utilizing your elemental magic.

If you equip the ice bow something special will happen when you hold the attack button!
